titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 442) to implement the recommendations of the Commission on Wartime Relocation and Internment of Civilians.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-301.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 442 (wartime relocation and internment of civilians).
